title: Which sample paper is best for class 12 maths? - Quora
tags: Central Board of Secondary Education, India

response.answer_text: CBSE released its Revised Syllabus on 29 th March followed by the Latest CBSE Sample Paper issued on 19th September with several major changes suggested for 2020 Board Exams. Those included new typologies like:  Match the following  True and False  Fill in the blanks  MCQs  Picture based Questions  Tabular based Questions  Passage based Questions Because of these changes, there was panic among teachers, parents and students alike. To help them at this stage, Oswaal Books revised their sample question papers and released them in the market, first. The quality and accuracy of these sample papers is unmatched in the market today. These Sample Papers include 5 solved question papers and 10 self-assessment papers along with ‘most likely questions’ generated by Oswaal’s AI algorithm that will help you prepare better. They also consist of commonly made errors and 2019 question paper with detailed solutions along with Mind Maps’ and QR codes for high retention and latest CBSE Sample Paper for 2020 Board Examinations. Thus Oswaal Sample Question Papers are highly useful.

Well!! There are a lot of sample papers available in the market. Nowadays, students have gone crazy about it as exams are at threshold. I always tell my students and the same thing will tell you. NEVER EVER blindly follow or rely on a particular Sample paper or a book as BOARD EXAMS are unpredictable and no book or a sample paper can guarantee you 100% by doing that book or sample papers. However, you may refer to the different books or sample papers ONLY for PRACTICE PURPOSE. Try to be thorough with your concepts so that you can attempt any question from any book. Tip: Do not forget to attempt CBSE OFFICIAL SAMPLE PAPERS. They are authentic and your board exam will based on the same pattern as the sample papers. For any Assistance or Query: Connect: themathscholars@gmail.com
